001package com.telos.loops.model;
002
003import java.util.Collections;
004import java.util.Map;
005
006/**
007 * Optional request configuration for API calls.
008 *
009 * <p>Allows you to customize individual API requests by providing additional HTTP headers. Use
010 * {@link #none()} for default behavior with no custom headers.
011 *
012 * <p>Example usage:
013 *
014 * <pre>{@code
015 * // No custom options
016 * RequestOptions options = RequestOptions.none();
017 *
018 * // With custom headers
019 * RequestOptions options = new RequestOptions(
020 *     Map.of("X-Custom-Header", "value")
021 * );
022 * }</pre>
023 *
024 * @param headers additional HTTP headers to include in the request (immutable copy is created)
025 */
026public record RequestOptions(Map<String, String> headers) {
027
028  public RequestOptions {
029    headers = headers == null ? Map.of() : Map.copyOf(headers);
030  }
031
032  /**
033   * Creates a RequestOptions instance with no custom headers.
034   *
035   * @return a RequestOptions with empty headers map
036   */
037  public static RequestOptions none() {
038    return new RequestOptions(Collections.emptyMap());
039  }
040}
